
```
third_party
├── git
├── include
│   ├── linux
│   ├── mac_intel
│   ├── mac_m1
│   └── windows
│       └── opencv
│           └── include
└── lib
    ├── linux
    ├── mac_intel
    ├── mac_m1
    └── windows
        └── opencv
            ├── bin
            └── lib
```
This way I think it's better cause the include directory and bin directory are the same level
